alert.note: Alert for Kings (Brooklyn); Richmond (Staten Is.) (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 15 at 6:27PM EDT by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT RICHMOND AND ADJACENT PORTIONS OF KINGS COUNTIES THROUGH 700 PM EDT... At 627 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Huguenot, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Oakwood around 635 PM EDT. Todt Hill around 640 PM EDT. The Verrazano Narrows Bridge and Tompkinsville around 650 PM EDT. Bay Ridge around 655 PM EDT. Bensonhurst around 700 PM EDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
